entry.title: From Good To Great In Dashboard Design: Research, Decluttering And Data Viz
entry.summary: Dribbbleshots just might be the hotbed of questionable dashboards. Striking visuals, little context, and no research: all recipes for mediocrity. Mediocrity won’t do. We’ll pursue greatness. And in that pursuit, we’ll cover research, decluttering, and data visualization.
